h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location
content: Golden Lining can be found in Relief of the Fallen Loong Shrine in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong after you have killed Red Loong, Black Loong, and Cyan Loong. This requires you to have the Loong Scales.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Lining.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Lining', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location'.
The content is as follows:
Golden Lining can be found in Relief of the Fallen Loong Shrine in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong after you have killed Red Loong, Black Loong, and Cyan Loong. This requires you to have the Loong Scales.
